meanings.definition: Unattractive in a dowdy or old-fashioned way.
meanings.sent1: She felt frumpy in her outdated dress.
meanings.sent2: The frumpy sweater made her look older than she was.
meanings.sent3: Even though she felt frumpy, her smile still shone brightly.
meanings.sent4: The frumpy curtains in the room made it feel like a time capsule.
meanings.sent5: The frumpy hairstyle was a constant reminder of her grandmother.

meanings.sent1: She wore a frumpy dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her frumpy appearance stood out among the stylish crowd.
meanings.sent3: The frumpy outfit was unintentionally hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her frumpy look was like a blast from the past.
meanings.sent5: The frumpy attire clashed with the elegant decor of the event.

meanings.sent1: She tends to frumpy when she's feeling lazy.
meanings.sent2: He frumpies whenever he doesn't care about his appearance.
meanings.sent3: They frumpy on weekends to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent4: The old man frumpied around the house all day.
meanings.sent5: The cat frumpies after a long nap in the sun.
